Simiusi: Male Tiefling Wizard, NG. Str 13, Dex 9, Con 12, Int 15, Wis 10, Cha 10. Simiusi has blood red skin, with matted black hair and white eyes. He wears simple clothing and wields a quarterstaff. Simiusi is a pack-rat, and carries a satchel of random junk.

Humla: Male Tiefling Fighter, LG. Str 15, Dex 12, Con 8, Int 8, Wis 13, Cha 8. Humla has silver hair and silver eyes, and a pair of tiny wings. He wears hide armor and wields a glaive. Humla seeks to discover where he came from, and who his real family is.

Hunasa: Male Tiefling Barbarian, CG. Str 14, Dex 9, Con 17, Int 8, Wis 11, Cha 9. Hunasa has blood red skin, with white hair and black eyes. He wears leather armor and wields a trident and longbow. Hunasa is well-spoken and honest.

Alad: Male Tiefling Wizard, NG. Str 7, Dex 16, Con 10, Int 15, Wis 10, Cha 12. Alad has dark red skin, with braided brown hair and gold eyes. He wears gray robes and wields a dagger. Alad seeks to find his true love.

Apus: Male Tiefling Warlock, N. Str 11, Dex 15, Con 12, Int 15, Wis 14, Cha 17. Apus has blood red skin, with dark red hair and silver eyes. He wears leather armor and wields a light hammer and sickle. Apus lost his shadow to a hag.

Heodege: Male Tiefling Fighter, CN. Str 16, Dex 14, Con 9, Int 12, Wis 8, Cha 13. Heodege has red hair and black eyes, and wears glasses with gold rims. He wears splint armor and wields a shortsword and longbow. Heodege is searching for his lost brother.

Risiga: Male Tiefling Cleric, LE. Str 9, Dex 8, Con 9, Int 9, Wis 14, Cha 10. Risiga has dark red skin, with white hair and silver eyes. He wears leather armor and wields a light hammer. Risiga is impossibly lucky.

Hildiusa: Male Tiefling Fighter, N. Str 15, Dex 16, Con 12, Int 12, Wis 8, Cha 8. Hildiusa has dark red skin, with dark blue hair and black eyes. He wears splint armor and wields a longsword and longbow.
Odermes: Male Tiefling Monk, CE. Str 15, Dex 10, Con 11, Int 7, Wis 13, Cha 10. Odermes has crimson skin, with gray hair and white eyes. He wears well-made clothing and wields nunchaku (club).

Vibauda: Male Tiefling Monk, LN. Str 11, Dex 13, Con 5, Int 11, Wis 15, Cha 10. Vibauda is short, with dark purple hair and red eyes. He wears modest garments and wields a bo (quarterstaff). Vibauda seeks revenge against the sister who betrayed him.

Agris: Male Tiefling Fighter, LN. Str 14, Dex 14, Con 13, Int 10, Wis 15, Cha 6. Agris has thin red hair and gold eyes, and a distinctive scar on his leg. He wears hide armor and wields a halberd. Agris is hunting the warlord who murdered his family.

Athax: Male Tiefling Rogue, NG. Str 15, Dex 13, Con 9, Int 11, Wis 10, Cha 7. Athax has blonde hair and gold eyes, and wears glasses with iron rims. He wears studded leather and wields a rapier and shortbow. Athax seeks to steal an ancient artifact from the Gauntlet of Elemental Secrets.

Sarida: Male Tiefling Rogue, NG. Str 11, Dex 14, Con 13, Int 13, Wis 9, Cha 11. Sarida has black hair and red eyes, and horns engraved with dark symbols. He wears leather armor and wields a rapier and hand crossbow. Sarida seeks revenge against the thieves' guild which left him to hang.

Geliva: Male Tiefling Cleric, NG. Str 15, Dex 12, Con 9, Int 13, Wis 14, Cha 10. Geliva is tall and heavyset, with black hair and white eyes. He wears studded leather and wields a quarterstaff. Geliva seeks to continue the noble legacy of his father.
